conversation.message: I am highly impressed by Company A's mission and culture. I believe my qualifications align perfectly with this opportunity. I would like to formally apply for the open position.

To maximize my outcome (Rank 2) early and avoid guaranteed rejection from my Rank 1 choice, I will apply formally to Company_A.
